name: Death of Shinobi
description:
A ninja-styled platformer utilizing Pixel-Art, similar to platformer's of the NES or SEGA Genesis era, on Unity 2D.
Apparently we can't upload web playable version because of conflicts with Wwise. :(
Yes, it utilizes Wwise for all audio purposes (first time using it ourselves), as well as SimpleTasks by Martin Isla.
